version_description:
BIG UPDATE:  
- Achievements, Game Center integration 
- New ability tree: personalize your fighter
- Move list: your handy tool for learning all techniques
- Upgrade weapons and armor at the store
- 2 new locations and bosses: Hermit and Butcher 
- New weapons, armor and helmets 
- Localization for 3 new languages (German, French, Russian)

BIG UPDATE:  
- Achievements, Game Center integration 
- New ability tree: personalize your fighter
- Move list: your handy tool for learning all techniques
- Upgrade weapons and armor at the store
- 2 new locations and bosses: Hermit and Butcher 
- New weapons, armor and helmets 
- Localization for 3 new languages (German, French, Russian)

- New location and boss: Wasp
- New upgrade weapons and armor at the store
- New weapons, armor and helmets

Coming soon: Ranged weapons and magic!

- New location and boss: Wasp
- New upgrade weapons and armor at the store
- New weapons, armor and helmets

Coming soon: Ranged weapons and magic!

Get ready for an epic fighting story continuation!

In this highly-anticipated update you will have to struggle with a new powerful villain, Widow, and her minions. But don't worry, now you have a chance to access:
- Tons of new weapons, helms and armor
- Ranged weapons to rain death upon your enemies
- A brand new Magic system
- A redesigned Perk set
- Exciting, unpredictable Duels
- Several bugs fixed and game optimization

Get ready for an epic fighting story continuation!

In this highly-anticipated update you will have to struggle with a new powerful villain, Widow, and her minions. But don't worry, now you have a chance to access:
- Tons of new weapons, helms and armor
- Ranged weapons to rain death upon your enemies
- A brand new Magic system
- A redesigned Perk set
- Exciting, unpredictable Duels
- Several bugs fixed and game optimization

- Fixed game crashing on several occasions
- Minor bug fixes
- Added 4 new languages: Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Japanese, Korean

- Fixed game crashing on several occasions
- Minor bug fixes
- Added 4 new languages: Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Japanese, Korean

It’s time to venture forth to finally reach the Gates of Shadows!
In this long-expected update we deliver to you:

- Glorious new Act VI and its mighty overlord, Shogun!
- Loads of new weapons, armor, helmets, throwing weapons and magic!
- Faster and much more powerful Magic
- Missile replenish every round
- Redesigned interface
- Refactored perk system
- Game optimization & various bugfixes

It’s time to venture forth to finally reach the Gates of Shadows!
In this long-expected update we deliver to you:

- Glorious new Act VI and its mighty overlord, Shogun!
- Loads of new weapons, armor, helmets, throwing weapons and magic!
- Faster and much more powerful Magic
- Missile replenish every round
- Redesigned interface
- Refactored perk system
- Game optimization & various bugfixes

Be ready to continue your quest for glory! In this update you will see:
- A new plot chapter with a dramatic plot twist, new battles, perks, weapons, armor and magic!
- New spectacular boss abilities!
- Advanced options menu with controller, sound and graphics settings
- Several interface improvements
- Various bugfixes and performance optimization

Be ready to continue your quest for glory! In this update you will see:
- A new plot chapter with a dramatic plot twist, new battles, perks, weapons, armor and magic!
- New spectacular boss abilities!
- Advanced options menu with controller, sound and graphics settings
- Several interface improvements
- Various bugfixes and performance optimization

This update contains:
- A complete plotline with lots of new dialogues and more!
- On-screen controls improvement
- Style bar gain overhaul
- Various bugfixes and performance optimization

This update contains:
- A complete plotline with lots of new dialogues and more!
- On-screen controls improvement
- Style bar gain overhaul
- Various bugfixes and performance optimization

In this update you'll see:

- Forge: Now you can enchant any equipment!
- The Eclipse: Take a chance and fight incredibly strong enemies to get fabulous rewards!
- Perks: Completely new skill tree with upgradeable abilities.
- Ranged weapons now have an unlimited amount of ammo.

- Solved localization problems.
- Various bug fixes and optimizations.

In this update you'll see:

- Forge: Now you can enchant any equipment!
- The Eclipse: Take a chance and fight incredibly strong enemies to get fabulous rewards!
- Perks: Completely new skill tree with upgradeable abilities.
- Ranged weapons now have an unlimited amount of ammo.

- Solved localization problems.
- Various bug fixes and optimizations.

This update contains:
- Ability to fight again in any battle you've already won
- Several bugfixes and performance optimization
- Enter the Gates of Shadows and prepare to start your tremendous journey through the shadow lands!

In this update you'll see:

- Content:
 Act VII: chapter 2 is available now! Continue your journey to the mighty Titan and learn the truth about your companions!

- Improved optimization:
* Dump issue fixed
* Application loading time is decreased
* Ad display issue fixed
* Download issues fixed
* Progress loss issue fixed
* Various bug fixes
* Act VII coins disappearance issue fixed

In this update you'll see:

- Content:
Ascension: A new battle variation awaits. Rise to the challenge and obtain all pieces of mystical gear. Only a complete set grants you the powers of the "Tempest Rage".
The mysterious Puppeteer has set the stage for you!

- Improved optimization:
* Payment issue
* “Gates of Shadows” crash issue fix
* Various bug fixes

This update contains:

Content:
You have waited for him so long. You have craved to face him in a fight to settle your soul. And now - he is here. Do you hear how the earth shakes under his feet, how the alien sky is shivering? Titan awaits you - fight him!

Act 7 Chapter 3 is now available! Discover the final part of the story, fight the mighty Titan and find out what awaits you!

Improved optimization:
- Fixed problem with showing ads
- Various bug fixes

This update contains:

Content:
-New game mode: "Underworld" - fight epic bosses together with friends!

League system: 
-Challenge others, become the best and win valuable prizes!
-New chapter in the story of the Shadow Fight 2 world
-Daily unique tasks - finish them in the Underworld and receive a reward!
-Raid Fights have a chat now - cooperate with your team!
-New shop section - Raid equipment: Become even stronger!

Optimizations:
-Fixed bugs with ads and news
-Fixed several other bugs

In this update: 
*Top 100. Be the best!
*Player statistics. Improve your stats, know your rivals.
*A new deadly enemy at the 2nd floor of the Underworld.
*Pay Gems to access raids: the dangers of the Underworld are even closer!
*A better combat preparation window. Select charges without another menu.
*The Underworld is now accessible after defeating Lynx’s 5th guard.
*A new Large Charge of Darkness.
*Damage done in the raid will always be counted!
*Bugs fixes, balance adjusted.

* Fight your way through the underworld and face the new raid boss - Arkhos
* Sixth dan added for those who seek competition and glory
* New challenging daily quests
* Increased rewards for daily quests
* Inactive players do not get season’s reward
* Better anti-cheat system
* Temporary bans added
* Bugfixes

* Underworld Сonqueror`s pack: build up your strength with all you need to defeat any boss! Get a chance to hit the JACKPOT of 10,000 gems!
* Improve yourself! Win items from the Monk’s Set by taking top 5 places in the leagues!
* A new menace in the Underworld: Hoaxen
* A new challenge for the strongest: 7th dan
* A new handy discounts menu: know the most advantageous offers!
* Boast your success: medals awarded for being among the TOP-100 in the info window
* Bugfixes

* Seductive witch Morgana and her horde of spiders have taken hold upon the Underworld! Defeat Morgana and get valuable gear.
* New unique items: snatch your award while you can!
* Halloween chest with incredible items! Find some charges of darkness or a key to Morgana's chamber!
* Bug fixes

- Valentine's day melted the ice hearts of Eternals, and now they are ready to give some valuable artifacts to the worthy warrior!
- Vortex, Fatum, Arkhos and Hoaxen give out special rewards to those who scored the first place and win in raid
- A chest with new items (Casket of Fates) avaliable for limited time
- Special holiday items, so let your friends be jealous!
- Bug Fixes

- Boss battles can be really tough sometimes... Teamwork can do the job!
- The long-expected opportunity to join a clan or to create your own. Invite your friends! 
- Gathering clan raids
- Clan enter requirements settings
- Clan chat for communication and raid invites
- Ranks: provide different rights for your clan members
- Colorful clan logos and clan descriptions
- Search for a suitable clan or use a list of recommended ones
- Korean language supported in chat
- Bug fixes

- Top 100 clans leaderboard
- May has been nerfed in Eclipse mode
- New clan icons
- Changes in "General" and "Recruit" rights
- "Last online" status for players
- Fixed bug with impossibility to manage your clan
- Added limit of clan raids created simultaneously at one boss
- Charges of Darkness now deal variable damage and its slightly increased
- Сomposite Sword damage increased
- Chat optimization, clan search improvements
- Anticheat system improvements
- Bug fixes

- Magic mirror opens the gates to other worlds! Find out the story of the Halloween night!
- Halloween raid - fight with the witch and get a prediction!
- Mystical Chest - time to get unique magical items!
- Elixirs - powerful buffs for raids - already in the shop!
- Bone coins - right from the witch's purse! Acquire in halloween raid and spend on special chest and elixirs. Watch the gathering progress in your dojo!
- Raid masquerade - fights temporarily became faster and more dynamic!

- New clan rating calculation rules - personal clan rating doesn't ""follow"" if you move to another (new or old) clan.
- Raid chat rules - no more abusive words and insults. Terms of use for raid chats. Ban in raid chats for breaking the rules.
- Anti-Cheat system improvement
- Bugfixes
- Optimization

- New clan rating calculation rules - personal clan rating doesn't ""follow"" if you move to another (new or old) clan.
- Raid chat rules - no more abusive words and insults. Terms of use for raid chats. Ban in raid chats for breaking the rules.

- Bugfixes

- Bugfixes

*Tenebris awaits glorious warriors at the 3rd tier of the Underworld!
*Furious Warrior`s Pack awaits new players in the first act!
*The full description of "throwing enemy on the ground" challenge has changed
*Enchantment reset is fixed
*Bug with the purchased item regaining is fixed
*Bugs with offers and news are fixed
*Bug with data losses after progress restorarion is fixed
*Bug with gems reward for watching video is fixed
*Game security improved

Shadow Fight 2 Update—New technology and new content. 
 
 - We have worked hard and are proud to announce that our game has been completely rewritten with the Unity engine!
 - The third layer of the Underworld has been expanded, and a new boss is available!
 - The raid store has a new set of armor!
 - Collect the whole set to get a mythical enchantment in the forge!
 - The interface has been updated with additional sounds for some of its elements.
 - Many bugs have been fixed.
 
 Enjoy!

This update contains:
- Raids optimization
- Anti-Cheat system improvement
- Bugfixes

*Tenebris awaits glorious warriors at the 3rd tier of the Underworld!
*Furious Warrior`s Pack awaits new players in the first act!
*The full description of "throwing enemy on the ground" challenge has changed
*Enchantment reset is fixed
*Bug with the purchased item regaining is fixed
*Bugs with offers and news are fixed
*Bug with data losses after progress restorarion is fixed
*Bug with gems reward for watching video is fixed
*Game security improved

Shadow Fight 2 Update—New technology and new content. 
 
 - We have worked hard and are proud to announce that our game has been completely rewritten with the Unity engine!
 - The third layer of the Underworld has been expanded, and a new boss is available!
 - The raid store has a new set of armor!
 - Collect the whole set to get a mythical enchantment in the forge!
 - The interface has been updated with additional sounds for some of its elements.
 - Many bugs have been fixed.
 
 Enjoy!

This update contains:
- Raids optimization
- Anti-Cheat system improvement
- Bugfixes

*Tenebris awaits glorious warriors at the 3rd tier of the Underworld!
*Furious Warrior`s Pack awaits new players in the first act!
*The full description of "throwing enemy on the ground" challenge has changed
*Enchantment reset is fixed
*Bug with the purchased item regaining is fixed
*Bugs with offers and news are fixed
*Bug with data losses after progress restorarion is fixed
*Bug with gems reward for watching video is fixed
*Game security improved

Shadow Fight 2 Update—New technology and new content. 
 
 - We have worked hard and are proud to announce that our game has been completely rewritten with the Unity engine!
 - The third layer of the Underworld has been expanded, and a new boss is available!
 - The raid store has a new set of armor!
 - Collect the whole set to get a mythical enchantment in the forge!
 - The interface has been updated with additional sounds for some of its elements.
 - Many bugs have been fixed.
 
 Enjoy!

* Generous discounts!

* Fixed video ad issues
* Fixed issues with enchantments
* Improved the roulette wheel
* Fixed several visual bugs
* Improved optimization and protection
